name: kingbit
description:
kingbit is a new turn-based multiplayer game that combines elements of chess with innovative mechanics.

In this game classic chess pieces take up multiple cells, have different attack strengths, and different move ranges!

While seemingly complicated the game is actually easy-to-learn and quick-to-play but hard-to-master.

The game can be played ONLINE, versus "The Computer" or in "Tabletop Mode" like a board game.

If you're looking for a game to test your strategic thinking and pass the time, give kingbit a try today!
